resources.string: Try again on my phone bill
Price {PRICE} - Message and data rates may apply
Please wait... Your purchase is in progress.
The purchase request has been successfully sent. Please wait a few seconds to be able to play the full game.
In order to enjoy the full version of {GAME_NAME}, please enter your Promotion Code
You now have the full version of {GAME_NAME}! Enjoy your game!
An error occurred while verifying your Promotion Code.
Your Promotion Code is not valid. Please try again.
Please wait. If the purchase is confirmed, you will be redirected to the main menu.
Thank you for your purchase! Enjoy your game!
Do you want to try again?
A 3G or Wi-Fi connection is needed to purchase the game. Please enable the connection and try again.
A 3G or 4G connection is needed to purchase the game. Please enable the connection and try again.
You can purchase {GAME_NAME} with your credit card for {PRICE} *
Create an account and pay with just one click next time.
Last 3 digits on the back of your card
You already have a Gameloft account
Pay directly without creating an account
Gameloft uses advanced encryption security technology to protect your credit card information.
**Your email address will be used exclusively to send you the bill.
Some of the information you entered is incorrect. Please check the sections in red below.
An account with that email address already exists. You can login with this email address or create a new account.
In order for us to process your payment, please fill in your billing information below.
The email address and/or password you entered are not correct. Please try again.
Your credit card has expired or is invalid. Please update your billing information below.
An invoice has just been sent to your email address as a record.
Your account has been successfully created!
Please enter your email address below. You will receive your password in a few seconds.
We\'re sorry, we couldn\'t find your email address. Please try again or register.
Please check your email, a new password has been sent.
Please tap CONTINUE to finalize the purchase.
It seems that you do not have a SIM card inserted. You will be redirected to our Shop. If necessary, please select your operator to continue.
We were unable to process your transaction as expected; you are going to be redirected to our shop to continue. If necessary, please select your operator to continue.
Our records indicate that you already bought this game. You can play it again right away by pressing the button below.
Pay on my phone bill - Message and data rates may apply
Enjoy the full version of {GAME} for {PRICE} per month only!
Unable to retrieve a valid content profile for your operator.
Phone card is locked; requires a PUK code to unlock.
Phone card is locked; requires a PIN code to unlock.
Phone card is locked; requires a network PIN to unlock.
<b>Price {PRICE} - The game will be purchased via SMS; transaction fees will appear on your phone bill.</b
<b>Price {PRICE} you paid {PAID}- You only need to send {COUNT} SMS. Transaction fees will appear on your phone bill.</b
SMS sent {COUNT}/{TOTAL} please do not leave this page.
HuaFuBao is not installed on your phone. Install it now?
